OD: For cafis 3DS 2.0, when login is not available, then return NE1012
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when login is not valid, then return NE0100
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when signature is not available, then return NE1026
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when 3dsVersion is not available, then return NE1163
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when 3dsVersion is not valid, then return NE1164
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when channelType is not available, then return NE1029
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when channelType is not valid, then return NE1030
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when callbackUrl is not available, then return NE1035
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when callbackUrl is not valid, then return NE1036
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when return is not available, then return NE1165
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when returnUrl is not valid, then return NE1166
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when cardData is not available, then return NE1038
For cafis 3DS 2.0, when cardData is not valid, then return NE1037
Post/v1/3ds - For cafis 3DS 2.0, when threeDSMethod is N with {any number}0000003 in /v1/enroll response, then 3ds not available and return /v1/3ds response
Post/v1/3ds - For cafis 3DS 2.0, when threeDSMethod is N with {any number}0000004 in /v1/enroll response, then 3ds not available and return /v1/3ds response
Post/v1/3ds - when threeDSMethod is N with {any number}0000002 in /v1/enroll response, then do 3ds2.0
Post/v1/3ds - when threeDSMethod is N with {any number}0000001 in /v1/enroll response, then fallback to 3ds1.0
Use OAuth2 token to do cafis 3ds2.0
Post/v1/3ds -  For cafis 3DS 2.0, when card number is 200000000000XXXX, then return the related errorcode
